name: EradiKateu2122 Clarifying Blemish Gel Cleanser with Salicylic Acid, Prebiotic Complex & Niacinamide
about: What it is:A gel cleanser expertly formulated with visible blemish-clearing, skin-restoring ingredients including salicylic acid, niacinamide, and a Prebiotic Complex..Skin Type:Combination and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid: Helps diminish the appearance of blemishes while encouraging natural, gentle exfoliation..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Kate Somervilleu2019s gentle gel cleanser is expertly formulated with salicylic acid along with niacinamide that visibly evens skin tone and refines pores as well as a Prebiotic Complex that helps balance skin. This dermatologist-tested formula clears and cleanses while visibly improving texture and tone.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid: Helps diminish the appearance of blemishes while encouraging natural, gentle exfoliation..-Prebiotic Complex: Balances and restores skin flora to minimize dry, stripped, and damaged skin..-Niacinamide: Visibly smooths uneven skin tone from post-blemish marks...Active Ingredient: Salicylic Acid 1%. .Inactive Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Maltooligosyl Glucoside, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Propanediol, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Niacinamide, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Glycerin, Lactobacillus Ferment, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, PEG-9 Cocoate, Polyglyceryl-6 Ricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Cocoate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Propylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, PEG-32 Distearate, PEG-175 Distearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Polydextrose, Dextrin, Amylopectin, Maltodextrin, Thymol, Terpineol, Sorbeth-450 Tristearate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use morning and evening. .-Dispense a quarter-size amount and massage gently onto wet face, avoiding eye area. .-Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency of this product. It's a super thick gel which helps prevent you from using too much. I love that theirs green tea extract in it and defiantly feel like this reduces the redness/inflammation of my acne.

reviews.review_title: Leaves a weird film over skin after use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser leaves a film over your skin after use. It doesn't feel clean and makes me anxious about getting a breakout bc every other cleanser I've used (including the Eradikate one) does not leave a weird film. I was using this as my second cleanse and ended up having to do a third cleanse with something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the pink cleanser from this brand and the white exfoliating one. And in comparison it didnu2019t do as much but this one changed my skin. Iu2019ve dealt with bad acne and breakouts for years and my skin has never looked its best. I am so happy give this cleanser a try for a few days you will see a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was very hydrating and gentle but didnu2019t do much for my acne :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amZing. I normally use the IS Clinical cleanser which is what I have been loving for my acne prone skin for the past 6 months. I did have a backup of it but this one intrigued me. I always loved kate sommervilles products and this is no different. Clean nicely without leaving the skin dry and inconfortable while still helping with my acne. I use this as my second cleanse and I really love itu263aufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a lots of acne and little bumps on my face and this has taken my face and made it so smooth and clear! I still have breakouts but never as bad as this face wash helps control it- only use a pea sized amount and itu2019s more than enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this cleanser a while ago and would use it every two to three days. At first I thought this cleanser was actually causing me to get little whiteheads and maybe that was itu2019s way of u201cpurgingu201d my skin Iu2019m not sure. Since then Iu2019ve started using this cleanser every morning and OMG itu2019s made a huge difference in my skin. I get fewer breakouts and my texture is sooo smooth, itu2019s also so gentle on skin! Doesnu2019t dry your skin at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know how many cleansers Iu2019ve gone through just to find that I never love it.  THIS IS WHAT YOU NEED.  Literally holy grail status.  I will be buying this cleanser again and again.  My skin feels so smooth and soft after and I notice an amazing difference in my skin.  I havenu2019t had any breakouts whatsoever and it plays nice with the rest of my skincare.  If youu2019re looking for a new cleanser you wonu2019t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this cleanser! The ingredients are great and I always steer clear from anything that will break me out. The texture is almost jelly like but does foam up a bit with water. It doesn't strip your skin or make your skin feel tight after washing which is amazing! It has definitely helped my skin texture and breakouts. So gentle! I think I found my forever cleanser I love this!!

reviews.review_title: Great product for my old acne scars!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has helped my breakouts a lot! I've broken out so much over the last 6 months due to stress, hormones, environment etc. I was using so many products my skin couldn't breath. I decided to try this and cut back to just a good cleanser and moisturizer and my skin has gotten much better! I've noticed some acne that has been around for years slowly fade away. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. Definitely worth the price! Iu2019ve received compliments saying that my skin is glowing and looks amazing. I have acne prone skin and this has diminish any imperfections

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser did everything and MORE for me. I have dry skin and this didnt leave my skin feeling tight! It was not only soothing I instantly saw hyperpigmentation from sun damage go away after my THIRD use! I find this cleanser to take off my makeup and still leave my skin looking refreshed. During my time of the month this cleanser helped manage my acne and I noticed fewer break outs! Favourite from my line and even replaced my Murad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite cleanser. Itu2019s so good my face feels comeoletely comfortable after not dry or tight. Cleans so well and pores look small. Really helps with pimples. Feels refreshing and smells soooo good
